STACKS.title: MERN
STACKS.summary: MongoDB • Express • React • Node.js — a classic JavaScript full-stack setup.

STACKS.title: Next.js (React)
STACKS.summary: Server-side rendering, static generation, and API routes built on top of React.

STACKS.title: Vite + React
STACKS.summary: Lightning-fast dev server and optimized build for modern frontend apps.

STACKS.title: Remix
STACKS.summary: A modern framework focused on web fundamentals and great UX for routing/data.

STACKS.title: SvelteKit
STACKS.summary: Svelte-powered framework for tiny bundle sizes and excellent DX.

STACKS.title: Node.js + Express
STACKS.summary: Lightweight, unopinionated server layer for APIs and microservices.

STACKS.title: NestJS
STACKS.summary: Opinionated TypeScript-friendly backend framework inspired by Angular.

STACKS.title: Deno
STACKS.summary: Secure runtime for JavaScript and TypeScript with built-in tooling.

STACKS.title: Prisma
STACKS.summary: Type-safe database toolkit that works great with TypeScript/Node.js.

STACKS.title: Supabase
STACKS.summary: Open-source Firebase alternative — Postgres + realtime + auth.

STACKS.title: Testing (Jest / Vitest)
STACKS.summary: Unit / integration testing tools widely used in the JS ecosystem.

STACKS.title: CI / CD
STACKS.summary: GitHub Actions, CircleCI, and Vercel for continuous integration and deployment.
